question_text: A desktop system fails POST and displays no video output. The system emits a pattern of long and short beeps. What are two appropriate next steps? (Select two)
answer_options: Check manufacturer documentation for beep codes
Reseat the video card or onboard video cable
correct_answer: Check manufacturer documentation for beep codes
Reseat the video card or onboard video cable
explanation: Beep codes help diagnose hardware issues. Video-related errors can cause no display. Manufacturer documentation and video subsystem inspection are key.
